children.text:
Great storytelling is all in the details.

From rhythm and pacing to music and dialogue, I’ve always been fascinated by the meticulous, puzzle-like process of crafting a great edit. Whether it's calculating comic timing or ratcheting up suspense, I love making stories work.

With over 14 years of experience, I’ve edited across multiple formats including national commercial campaigns, feature film, television series and broadcast documentaries. This variety of platforms and genres has allowed me to hone the skills, speed and creative instincts needed to bring concepts to life in a fresh and exciting way.

In addition to working as lead editor in a fast-paced agency setting, I’ve also had the chance to edit on location throughout North America, South Africa and Kenya. I’ve been fortunate to collaborate with talented directors and creative professionals from around the globe on immersive, award-winning content.
